{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Put the","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" seasoned veges ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"onto an oven dish and cook in the middle of the oven for 20-25 minutes.\nRotate the veges and cook for another 10-15 minutes.\nCheck the vegetables to see if they are cooked to your liking - carrots are better to check since they generally take the longest to cook. ","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Tips:","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If the vegetables are cooked, but not to crispy, then turn on the grill, but keep a close eye because it will burn quickly","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Don't check the oven too often, it can cause things to take a lot longer to cook","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"list-item","content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It will smell nice from about minute 20, but the longer you leave it to cook, the better the taste.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
